hadiths.text: Narrated Salama:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "Whoever (intentionally) ascribes to me what I have not said then (surely) let him occupy his seat in Hell-fire

chapter.ara-name: باب إِثْمِ مَنْ كَذَبَ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The sin of a person who tells a lie against the Prophet (ﷺ)
